    • Method Detail

      • getWorkingDirectory

        public java.nio.file.Path getWorkingDirectory()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the working directory of this task. If the directory doesn't exist, it will be created and returned.
        Returns:
        The working directory of this task.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If exception occurs during creating the directory.

      • setFileAsPermanent

        public void setFileAsPermanent(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Sets given file as permanent. Permanent files are not deleted after task is completed.
        Parameters:
        file - Temporary file to set as permanent.
